title: 210 Cute & Romantic Quotes That Will Make Her Smile

steps.title: Share a cute quote to make her smile.
steps.content: Share a cute quote to make her smile. There are many ways to make the woman in your life happy, and sending her a cute quote will likely brighten her day. Send her a well-known quote from her favorite book, movie, or TV show, or send her a good morning text with your own romantic words. Here are some examples: [1] X Research source “Your love shines in my heart as the sun that shines upon the earth.” – Eleanor Di Guillo “You're my person. You will always be my person.” – Grey’s Anatomy “I fell in love the way you fall asleep: slowly, and then all at once.” – John Green “When I’m with you, everything feels right. You’re everything I could ever hope for.” “You’re my dream girl. I would follow you anywhere.” “My whole world revolves around you.” “Ever since I met you, no one else has been worth thinking about.” “I made a wish, and you came true.” “My face hurts from smiling so much whenever I’m with you.” “I love you more than I have ever found a way to say to you.” – “The Luckiest” by Ben Folds “I love you. I knew it the minute I met you. I'm sorry it took so long for me to catch up. I just got stuck.” – Silver Linings Playbook “I forget my name for a second every time I look into your eyes.” “You are my greatest adventure.” “You make my heart sing.” “You are the finest, loveliest, tenderest, and most beautiful person I have ever known—and even that is an understatement.” – F. Scott Fitzgerald

steps.title: Make her swoon with a romantic quote.
steps.content: Make her swoon with a romantic quote. If you want to be more romantic in your relationship, think of new and unique ways to tell your girl how much she means to you. Whisper a romantic quote in her ear or leave her a love note to let her know you’re thinking of her. Here are some examples: [2] X Research source “If I had a flower for every time I thought of you, I could walk in my garden forever.” – Alfred Lord Tennyson “For it was not into my ear you whispered, but into my heart. It was not my lips you kissed, but my soul.” – Judy Garland “Kiss me and you will see stars; love me and I will give them to you.” – Unknown “In case you ever foolishly forget: I am never not thinking of you.” – Virginia Woolf “You should be kissed, and often, and by someone who knows how.” – Gone With the Wind “You’re the melody to every love song.” “You helped me discover pieces of myself I never knew existed.” “You are the only one who has the key to my heart.” “Whatever happens tomorrow, or for the rest of my life, I'm happy now…because I love you.” – Groundhog Day “I could look into your eyes all day.” “You are the reason I believe in love.” “You are my dream come true.” “It's like my life isn't even real to me unless you're there, and you're in it, and I'm sharing it with you.” – Gilmore Girls “In all the world, there is no heart for me like yours. In all the world, there is no love for you like mine.” – Maya Angelou “Not even in my weakest moment have I considered letting you go.” – Judith McNaught

steps.title: Make her laugh with a funny saying.
steps.content: Make her laugh with a funny saying. If you and your special woman share a sense of humor, feel free to add a joke to your declaration of love. Think of some of your favorite inside jokes, or borrow a quote from a comedian or public figure. Here are some examples: [3] X Research source “Forget the butterflies. I feel the whole zoo when I’m with you.” “I love you more than coffee, but please don’t make me prove it.” “You’re like pizza. Even when you’re bad, you’re good.” “I love you and it’s getting worse.” – Joseph E. Morris “I love you even when I’m really, really hungry.” “I love you more than yesterday—yesterday, you were annoying.” “I love you like Kanye loves Kanye.” “I love being married. It's so great to find that one special person you want to annoy for the rest of your life.” – Rita Rudner “You are the cheese to my macaroni.” “You're not Google, but you've got everything I'm searching for, including the weird stuff.” “A guy knows he's in love when he loses interest in his car for a couple of days.” – Tim Allen “I can't make you love me, but I can fill my pantry with your favorite snacks and offer you a weekly stipend of $75.” – Rob Delaney “Marriage is like a walk in the park. Jurassic Park.” – Jeff Arch “I love you even when you eat my fries. And trust me, that’s a lot of love.” “I love you with all my belly. I would say heart, but my belly is bigger.”

steps.title: Tell her “I love you” in a special way.
steps.content: Tell her “I love you” in a special way. Try to think of new, interesting ways to tell her you love her to spark a new sense of romance in your relationship. Borrow a phrase from a swoon-worthy hero in one of her favorite romantic books or movies. This will show her that you really pay attention to her interests. Here are some examples: [4] X Research source “I love you, not only for what you are, but for what I am when I am with you.” – Roy Croft “You have bewitched me, body and soul, and I love... I love... I love you.” – Pride and Prejudice (2005) “Do I love you? My god, if your love were a grain of sand, mine would be a universe of beaches.” – The Princess Bride “I love you. You complete me.” – Jerry Maguire “I love you because the entire universe conspired to help me find you.” – Paulo Coehlo “When I tell you I love you, I don't say it out of habit. I say it to remind you that you are the best thing that has ever happened to me.” – Nikhil Saluja “Storm clouds may gather and stars may collide, but I love you until the end of time.” – Moulin Rouge “I swear I couldn’t love you more than I do right now, and yet I know I will tomorrow.” – Leo Christopher “I've never had a moment's doubt. I love you. I believe in you completely. You are my dearest one. My reason for life.” – Atonement “I do know some things. I know I love you. I know you love me.” – Game of Thrones “I love you, and I will love you until I die, and if there's life after that, I'll love you then.” – Cassandra Clare “You are the source of my joy, the center of my world, and the whole of my heart.” – Unknown “If I know what love is, it is because of you.” – Herman Hesse “I love you more than any obstacle that might get in our way.” – Unknown “You are my paradise and I would happily get stranded on you for a lifetime.” – Unknown

steps.title: Show your love how much she’s inspired you.
steps.content: Show your love how much she’s inspired you. Love can change a person for the better, so let your special lady know how much she’s impacted your life. Share a quote that talks about the power of love and how it influences the way you behave and see the world. Here are some examples: [5] X Research source “Being deeply loved by someone gives you strength while loving someone deeply gives you courage.” – Lao Tzu “Love is an endless act of forgiveness. Forgiveness is the key to action and freedom.” – Hannah Arendt “The best thing to hold onto in life is each other.” – Audrey Hepburn “Love is not about possession. Love is about appreciation.” – Osho “Love recognizes no barriers. It jumps hurdles, leaps fences, penetrates walls to arrive at its destination full of hope.” – Maya Angelou “The best and most beautiful things in the world cannot be seen or even touched. They must be felt with the heart.” – Helen Keller “Love does not consist in gazing at each other, but in looking outward together in the same direction.” – Antoine de Saint-Exupéry “Love is not only something you feel, it is something you do.” – David Wilkerson “A loving heart is the truest wisdom.” – Charles Dickens “Love cures people—both the ones who give it and the ones who receive it.” – Karl Menninger “Love makes your soul crawl out from its hiding place.” – Zora Neale Hurston “Love is a verb. Love—the feeling—is a fruit of love, the verb.” – Stephen Covey “In love, one and one are one.” – Jean-Paul Sartre “In true love it is the soul that envelops the body.” – Friedrich Nietzsche “Love must be as much a light as it is a flame.” – Henry David Thoreau

steps.title: Let her know how profound your love for her is.
steps.content: Let her know how profound your love for her is. If your love is as deep as the ocean and as vast as the sky, say so! She’ll likely appreciate your willingness to declare your love, and you may get bonus points for being so poetic about it. Here are some examples: [6] X Research source “In your light, I learn how to love. In your beauty, how to make poems.” – Rumi “I look at you and see the rest of my life in front of my eyes.” “My love for you is past the mind, beyond my heart, and into my soul.” – Boris Kodjoe “I have loved you all my life; it has just taken me this long to find you.” “I would rather spend one lifetime with you than face all the ages of this world alone.” – J.R.R. Tolkien “I love you more than there are stars in the sky and fish in the sea.” – Nicholas Sparks “I love you as certain dark things are to be loved, in secret, between the shadow and the soul.” – Pablo Neruda “Whatever our souls are made of, his and mine are the same.” – Emily Brontë “We loved with a love that was more than love.” – Edgar Allan Poe “I could hold you for a million years to make you feel my love.” – Bob Dylan “I’ll love you until the day I die and for eternity after that.” “You are all my heart ever talks about.” “You aren’t just my moon, my stars, and my sun. You’re my entire universe.” “I love you the way a drowning man loves air. And it would destroy me to have you just a little.” – The Crown of Embers by Rae Carson “But the you who you are tonight is the same you I was in love with yesterday, the same you I'll be in love with tomorrow.” – If I Stay by Gayle Forman

steps.title: Keep things short and sweet if you don’t have a flair for the dramatic.
steps.content: Keep things short and sweet if you don’t have a flair for the dramatic. Not everyone wants to profess their love in a long paragraph, and that’s okay! If you’re a person of few words or your lady isn’t much of a romantic herself, sharing a short love quote is a great way to express your feelings. Here are some examples: [7] X Research source “You are my sun, my moon, and all of my stars.” – E.E. Cummings “Love is a single soul inhabiting two bodies.” – Aristotle “I am yours. Don’t give myself back to me.” – Rumi “Your voice is my favorite sound.” “You are my heart, my life, my one and only thought.” – Arthur Conan Doyle “In you, I have found the love of my life and my closest, truest friend.” “Loving you was never an option. It was a necessity.” – Truth Devour “You have a place in my heart no one else could have.” – F. Scott Fitzgerald “All I want to do is make you happy.” “Everything about you captivates me.” “I’ll always be yours, no matter what.” “I can’t seem to get you out of my head, no matter how hard I try.” “It’s me and you against the world, babe.” “You’re so easy to love.” “You are my sunshine on a cloudy day."

steps.title: Don’t be afraid to show your vulnerable side.
steps.content: Don’t be afraid to show your vulnerable side. One of the best things about being in love is knowing that you have someone on your side who won’t judge you. Even if you’re not the type to express your love verbally, think of how much it would mean to your special lady to hear it directly. Choose a quote that lets her know how deep your love truly is. Here are some examples: [8] X Research source “You are the poem I never knew how to write, and this life is the story I have always wanted to tell.” – Tyler Knott Gregson “If you live to be a hundred, I want to live to be a hundred minus one day, so I never have to live without you.” – A.A. Milne “I love you not for whom you are, but who I am when I’m by your side.” – Gabriel García Márquez “I wish you to know that you have been the last dream of my soul.” – Charles Dickens “My whole life changed for the better the moment I met you.” “I’ll follow you into the dark.” – “I Will Follow You Into the Dark” by Death Cab for Cutie “I know everything will be all right because I have you by my side. You’re my rock.” “I’d rather have you on your worst day than anyone else on their best.” “Being with you feels like coming home.” “You are my everything.” “You make me feel like I can conquer the world.” “You are my safe haven.” “You make me happier than I ever thought I could be and if you let me, I will spend the rest of my life trying to make you feel the same way.” – Friends “I don’t know why the universe gave me the chance to be yours, but I’ll never take it for granted; I’m so lucky to be with you.” “Your love is all I need to feel complete.”

steps.title: Share a sweet quote to make her feel all warm and fuzzy inside.
steps.content: Share a sweet quote to make her feel all warm and fuzzy inside. There’s nothing wrong with being a little cheesy now and then. Think of what you could say to make your lady smile and to lift her spirits. Be sincere, but feel free to have a little fun. Here are some examples: [9] X Research source “You’re cute. Can I keep you forever?” “Whenever I tell you goodbye, I immediately start counting down the seconds until I can see you again.” “The thought of being with you is the only thing that gets me through a tough day.” “I hope your day is as nice as your smile.” “If you keep being so sweet, I’ll have diabetes very soon.” “You are the most beautiful person, inside and out.” “If I had to dream up the perfect woman, she wouldn't even come close to you.” – Boy Meets World “I’m so lucky to have fallen in love with my best friend.” “I am so totally, completely, overwhelmingly, eye-poppingly, life-changingly, spectacularly, passionately, deliciously in love with you.” “And in her smile, I see something more beautiful than the stars.” – Beth Revis “You are the reason I wake up with a smile every morning. You are the secret to my peaceful nights.” “Your love feels like a deep breath of fresh air.” “In you, I found everything I’ve been searching for.” “You are the music that makes my heart dance.” “When I saw you, I fell in love, and you smiled because you knew.” – Arrigo Boito

steps.title: Let your fiancée know how special she is.
steps.content: Let your fiancée know how special she is. Getting engaged can be very exciting, and you can make things even more special by reciting a cute quote during your proposal or at any time you want to remind your fiancée how happy you are to have her in your life. Here are some examples: [10] X Research source “I saw that you were perfect, and so I loved you. Then I saw that you were not perfect and I loved you even more.” – Angelita Lim “Every atom of your flesh is as dear to me as my own: in pain and sickness it would still be dear.” – Charlotte Brontë “I'm not telling you it's going to be easy, I'm telling you it's going to be worth it.” – Art Williams “Why, darling, I don't live at all when I'm not with you.” – Ernest Hemingway “I have seen the best and the worst of you, and I choose both.” – Sarah Kay “Being with you is the adventure of a lifetime, and I never want it to stop.” “If my life was a puzzle, you’d be the final piece that connects it all together.” “I hope someday we’ll look back on our relationship and our only regret will be that we didn’t start it sooner.” “For all the things my hands have held, the best by far is you.” – “Cecilia and the Satellite” by Andrew McMahon in the Wilderness “You are my forever and always.” “You make loving fun.” – “You Make Loving Fun” by Fleetwood Mac “My night has become a sunny dawn because of you.” – Ibn Abbad “You're a beautiful woman; you deserve a beautiful life. Nothing less.” – Water for Elephants “Nothing and no one can change my mind. Because I’m with you, I’m the luckiest person alive.” “When I see you, I see the rest of my life in front of my eyes.”

steps.title: Brighten your girlfriend’s day with a cute quote.
steps.content: Brighten your girlfriend’s day with a cute quote. Sharing a cute saying is a great way to be romantic with your girlfriend and let her know you’re thinking of her. Be a little flirtatious, or take a more serious approach and tell her how grateful you are to have her in your life. Here are some examples: [11] X Research source #* “You are the one girl that made me risk everything for a future worth having.” – Simone Elkeles “I find the most beautiful moment’s of life aren’t just with you but because of you.” – Leo Christopher “You’re kinda, maybe a little, sorta, pretty much always on my mind.” “I was so unproductive today. All I did was sit around thinking about you.” “When I think about the future, all I see is you.” “I am really glad you chose me out of everyone else.” “I can’t believe I lived [X] years without you in my life. What was I even doing?” “You are my favorite person to do nothing with.” “Because of you I can feel myself slowly but surely becoming the me I have always dreamed of being.” – “Becoming” by Tyler Knott Gregson “I look at you and I would rather look at you than all the portraits in the world.” – Frank O’Hara “You're more than just my girlfriend, you're my everything.” “I choose you. And I will keep choosing you over and over.” “I didn’t know what love was until I met you.” “I’m much more me when I’m with you.” “You are the love I didn’t know I needed.”

steps.title: Tell your wife how much you love her with a love quote.
steps.content: Tell your wife how much you love her with a love quote. Being married has its ups and downs, so it’s important to remind your wife how much you love and appreciate her and everything she does. If you want to be even more romantic , pair your quote with a bouquet of flowers, a box of chocolates, or another surprise gift. Here are some examples: [12] X Research source “To be your friend was all I ever wanted; to be your lover was all I ever dreamed.” – Valerie Lombardo “I knew it the very first time I touched her. It was like coming home.” – Sleepless in Seattle “Grow old with me. The best is yet to be.” – Robert Browning “If I had to do it all over again, I would still choose you.” “I love the feeling of doing life with you.” “You make even the ordinary moments extraordinary.” “Your words are my food, your breath is my wine. You are everything to me.” – Sarah Bernhardt “No measure of time with you will be long enough, but we'll start with forever.” – Stephenie Meyer “I know by experience that the poets are right: love is eternal.” – E.M. Forster “No matter how much time passes, being with you makes my heart race in the best way. Thank you for being mine.” “Loving you is the best decision I’ve ever made.” “You are the most beautiful thing I keep inside my heart.” “My favorite place in the world is next to you.” “Every time I look at you, I fall in love all over again.” “You are, and always have been, my dream.” – Nicholas Sparks

steps.title: Speak from the heart by creating your own romantic saying.
steps.content: Speak from the heart by creating your own romantic saying. While sharing famous love quotes can be romantic, finding your own words can make her feel even more special. Think of how much you love her, what you love about her, and how you can transfer those feelings into words. Don’t worry too much about being poetic—she’ll probably love whatever you say as long as you truly mean it. Here are some examples to get you started: “When I’m with you, nothing else matters. It’s as if the whole world fades away.” “I love you today. I’ll love you tomorrow. And I’ll keep loving you every day after that, too.” “I can’t believe a girl like you exists and that I’m lucky enough to have found you.” “My favorite part of every day is when I get to spend time with you.” “When someone asks me about my greatest achievement and the thing I’m most proud of, the only thing that comes to mind is you.” “I feel like I missed you before I even met you, and now that I have you in my life, I’m never letting you go.” “You’re the prettiest, funniest, most incredible woman I’ve ever met, and words cannot express how much I love you.” “You make me so incredibly happy. There’s no better match than me and you.” “People always say ‘I love you to the moon and back,’ but my love for you is like the universe—infinite.” “Every morning, I wake up with a smile on my face because I know I’ll get to see you.” “My favorite sound in the universe is your laugh, and my favorite sight is your smile.” “I love you not just for who you are, but because of who I become when I am with you. You make me a better person.” “As soon as I met you, I knew you were the thing I’d been waiting for my whole life.” “If I had a star for every time I thought of you, I’d have the whole universe.” “I never imagined I could love you more than I already do, but I was wrong.”

steps.title: Quote some of her favorite song lyrics.
steps.content: Quote some of her favorite song lyrics. Think of some of your lady’s favorite love songs and consider incorporating them in your next love note. This is a great option if you struggle to come up with romantic words yourself, and it will show her that you pay attention to her hobbies and interests. Here are some examples: [13] X Research source “You’re my end and my beginning. Even when I lose, I’m winning.” – “All of Me” by John Legend “All of my whole life through, I never loved no one but you.” – “Baby Love” by The Supremes “At long last, love has arrived, and I thank God I’m alive.” – “Can’t Take My Eyes Off You” by Frankie Valli “I’d walk through fire for you. Just let me adore you.” – “Adore You” by Harry Styles “You’re the closest to heaven that I’ll ever be.” – “Iris” by Goo Goo Dolls “Every inch of your skin is a Holy Grail I’ve got to find. Only you can set my heart on fire.” – “Love Me Like You Do” by Ellie Goulding “You are the best thing that’s ever been mine.” – “Mine” by Taylor Swift “To find a love like yours is rare these days ‘cause you’ve shown me what happiness is in so many ways.” – “How Sweet It Is (To Be Loved by You)” by Marvin Gaye and Tammi Terrell “And here we are in heaven, for you are mine.” – “At Last” by Etta James “To you, I’ll give the world.” – “Songbird” by Fleetwood Mac “This is our fate, I’m yours.” – “I’m Yours” by Jason Mraz “You’re still the one that I love, the only one I dream of.” – “You’re Still the One” by Shania Twain “If the sun refused to shine, I would still be loving you. When mountains crumble to the sea, there will still be me and you.” – “Thank You” by Led Zeppelin “You think you're one of millions, but you're one in a million to me.” – “The World” by Brad Paisley “This happens once every few lifetimes.” – “The Alchemy” by Taylor Swift
